reviewText:
I have seen both gentlemen interviewed many times and I thought this was one of the best.  The insight that Mr. Burton provided as to his vision of film-making was outstanding.  Mr. Depp seemed more relaxed than usual while talking to an interviewer.  He also revealed things that I had not heard before.

I would definitely recommend this video to any Depp or Burton admirer.

IT WAS LIKE JOHNNY WAS IN THE ROOM .

I SEEN IT 6 TIMES ALREADY IT IS HOT.
